content.demo-explain:
This is a KYC (Know Your Customer) demo application.

You can interact with this application to
· Use the Certification Body application (demo) to authenticate identity
· Send authentication data when opening a bank account
· Flow continues until
 identity verification on the bank side.

err-no-certification-authority.title: Certification body account not registered
err-no-certification-authority.msg:
An account for demonstration has not been registered.
Create an authentication company account for demonstration and record it on the block chain and local storage.

Also create a demo user and save it to local storage.

This process takes a few seconds.

content.demo-explain:
This demonstrates authentication using the certification body's application.

In this demo, the personal information entered directly in the form below is assumed correct and it's hash is registered by the certification body on the block chain.

In actual service, it is necessary to first confirm that the personal information is correct in some way (confirmation of the principal receipt by mailing etc.).

Also, in this demonstration, the expiration date of the authentication data is set to 15 minutes in order to make it easier to check expiration.

complete.title: Personal information authentication completed
complete.msg: We authenticated the personal information and registered the hash value on the block chain.

content.demo-explain:
On this demonstration you can check opening an account in the demo bank and can check sending your the certified personal information to the bank.

Account information will be recorded only in the local storage of the browser.

By pressing the 'Account Opening Application Execution' button, you can check the flow from the state where the general account opening application is completed to personal authentication.

certification.title: Sending authenticated personal information
certification.submit:
Send personal information
(for reading by the certification body identity application)

err-not-certificated.title: No authentication data
err-not-certificated.msg:
Personal information has not been authenticated yet.

Please try again after completing individual authentication with the certification body identity application.

err-expired.title: Authentication data expired
err-expired.msg:
The validity period of the authentication data has expired.

Please perform personal authentication again with the certification body identity application.

complete.title: Identification procedure completed
complete.msg: The identity verification procedure on the bank side has been completed.
